title: 99fonts.com - Ultra-Targeted Traffic for your Website / Blog
content:
This is the domain address of the (now defunct) 99fonts.com website/blog that specialised in middle eastern/hebrew etc typefaces. I had noticed the guy pulled the site down some time ago, but I thought that he might be coming back...but no, so now this great name is available again !

It still gets a tonne of legacy traffic (about 5000 Unique Visitors/month), so would be a great domain name for someone here either starting up a new design & typography blog/website focused on hebrew fonts, or somebody who already has one and is looking for some instant, highly targeted traffic (via 301/302 redirection).

Check it out here:

[http://cgi.ebay.com.au/99Fonts-COM-Design-Domain-Name-COM-2yo-PR3-5k-UVs...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201173929/http:/cgi.ebay.com.au/99Fonts-COM-Design-Domain-Name-COM-2yo-PR3-5k-UVs-m_W0QQitemZ300355580786QQcmdZViewItemQQptZLH_DefaultDomain_0?hash=item45ee967372&_trksid=p3911.c0.m14 "http://cgi.ebay.com.au/99Fonts-COM-Design-Domain-Name-COM-2yo-PR3-5k-UVs-m\_W0QQitemZ300355580786QQcmdZViewItemQQptZLH\_DefaultDomain\_0?hash=item45ee967372&\_trksid=p3911.c0.m14")

Cheers,  
Pat
author: patsnip
